mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, community_id, content, comments_writer, comment_created_at, comment_updated_at FROM comment WHERE community_id = #{communityId} ORDER BY comment_created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (community_id, content, comments_writer, comment_created_at, comment_updated_at) VALUES (#{communityId}, #{content}, #{commentsWriter}, NOW(), NOW())
